text:
This is exactly what it should be. A great price on decent instant coffee. Does it taste like freshed brewed? No, nothing other than freshed brewed coffee tastes that good. Does it taste better than other name brand instant coffee? Yup. By a long shot. It is good enough to drink black, not bitter. A hot water dispenser, a travel cup and off to work I go.
Expiration date was March 2012.

My second order arrived today. Expiration April 2012.
